dimensions.label: Communication Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin communicate with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will communicate clearly and straightforwardly, stating opinions without hesitation or sugar-coating.
Your FarTwin will communicate tactfully and considerately, carefully choosing words to maintain harmony.

dimensions.label: Interpersonal Skills
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin build relationships with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be highly attuned to the emotions and needs of those around them, fostering deep connections.
Your FarTwin will approach relationships with a logical and detached mindset, often valuing efficiency over emotional connection.

dimensions.label: Problem-Solving Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin tackle challenges?

options.description: Your FarTwin will rely on instinct and creative thinking to find innovative solutions.
Your FarTwin will approach problems with a systematic and methodical mindset, weighing data and evidence.

dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle uncertainty?

options.description: Your FarTwin will eagerly embrace risk and uncertainty, often seeking out new challenges and experiences.
Your FarTwin will prefer to avoid risk and uncertainty, opting for stability and predictability.

dimensions.label: Time Management
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin prioritize tasks?

options.description: Your FarTwin will maintain a structured and efficient schedule, prioritizing tasks based on importance.
Your FarTwin will adapt to changing circumstances and priorities, often going with the flow.

dimensions.label: Technological Comfort
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin interact with technology?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be well-versed in the latest technological advancements and trends, often embracing new tools and platforms.
Your FarTwin will prefer to rely on established methods and tools, sometimes resisting change or innovation.

dimensions.label: Social Environment
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin thrive in social situations?

options.description: Your FarTwin will naturally be the center of attention, effortlessly navigating large groups and networking with ease.
Your FarTwin will prefer to maintain a low profile, often preferring one-on-one interactions or small gatherings.

dimensions.label: Writing Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express themselves in writing?

options.description: Your FarTwin will use vivid imagery and creative language to convey their thoughts and emotions.
Your FarTwin will prefer clear and direct writing, avoiding flowery or unnecessary descriptions.
